japanese:
ふう、これで最後だね。
服の準備はオッケーかな。
translation:
*phew* This is the last of it, huh?
I think the clothes are all ready.

japanese: 終わったぁ～！
translation: We're dooone!

japanese:
お疲れさまでした。
結構、持ってきましたね。
translation:
Great job, everyone.
We found quite a lot of clothes, didn't we?

japanese:
めちゃくちゃ疲れた……。
服を持ってくるだけだからって侮ってたわ。
translation:
I'm so tired...
I totally underestimated how difficult it 
would be to just carry clothes over to the villa.

japanese: 腕の、筋肉が……。
translation: My arm muscles...

japanese: うわぁ、服がいっぱいだ。
translation: Wow, there are so many clothes.

japanese: 多すぎるだろ……。
translation: Maybe too many, don'tcha think..?

japanese:
お父さんの部屋だけじゃなくて、
倉庫にしまわれてた服も
持ってきちゃいましたからね。
translation:
Not only did we bring the clothes from Dad's room, 
but also the ones that were in storage.

japanese:
というか、こんな離島に
ここまで服を用意してどうするんだ？
translation:
Or rather, why does he keep this many clothes
on a remote island?

japanese:
それは、あれです！
備えておけば嬉しいなってやつです！
translation:
Well, you know!
It's nice to be prepared for anything!

japanese: それを言うなら、備えあれば憂いなし、だ。
translation:
Or rather, that you'll never have to
worry if you're prepared for anything.

japanese: ……あれ？
translation: ...Huh?

japanese: ちなみに意味は――
translation: So, that means%p-2;――

japanese: はいはい、勉強は忘れるんでしょ？
translation: Okay, okay, I thought we'd agreed to forget studying, right?

japanese:
お父さんがなんのために用意してたのかは
わからないけど――
translation: I have no idea why Dad had this many clothes prepared%p-2;――

japanese:
これだけあれば思う存分、
コーディネートできるじゃない。
translation:
But with this many,
we can coordinate to our heart's content.

japanese:
まさか、着せかえ人形の気持ちを
理解するときが来るとは思わなかった。
translation:
I never thought there would come a day
when I would understand how a dress-up doll feels.

japanese:
ふふふっ！
私も、フー君のコーディネートを
考えられる日が来るなんて思わなかったわ。
translation:
Heheheh!
I never thought there would come a day when 
I could put together an outfit just for you, Fu-kun.

japanese:
じゃ、さっそく始めましょ！
誰からいく？
translation:
Alright, let's start!
Who's first?

japanese: じゃあ、私から順番にってことでどう？
translation: Shall we go in order, starting with me?

japanese:
私は構わないわよ。
むしろ、あんたこそトップバッターでいいのかしら？
translation:
I don't mind.
Rather, is it really okay that you're up first?

japanese:
ふふん、実はもう構想があるんだよね。
二乃こそ、最初にやらないで
後悔しても知らないよ～？
translation:
Hehe, actually, I already have an idea.
Nino, if I don't go first, I'll definitely regret it later.

japanese:
……一花たちはああ言ってるけど、
正直、４番目でホッとしたよ。
translation:
...You all are saying that, but...
To be honest, I'm relieved to go fourth.

japanese:
ええ。
私たちは、あの２人ほど
ファッションに明るいわけではありませんし。
translation:
Yes.
We're not particularly knowledgeable
about fashion like those two.

japanese: これでゆっくり考えられる。
translation: Now, we can take our time to think.

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、ちゃんとみんなのセンスを
褒めないとダメだからね？
適当なコメントは禁止だよ？
translation:
Big bro, you have to praise everyone's sense
of style properly, okay?
Inappropriate comments are not allowed.

japanese:
（褒めるに値するものなら褒めるつもりだが、
　俺にファッションセンスを期待されても困る……）
translation:
(If there's something worth praising,
 I'll praise it, but it's troublesome to be expected
 to have a sense of fashion...)

japanese:
それじゃ、フータロー君。
これと、これと、あと靴はこっちね。
着替えてみて。
translation:
Well then, Futaro-kun.
Take these and these, and your shoes are right there.
Then go ahead and change.

japanese: わかった。
translation: Got it.

japanese: なっ――
translation: WHA%p-2;――

japanese: フ、フータロー！？
translation: F-FUTARO?!

japanese: ん？
translation: Hm?

japanese:
どうしてここで着替えようとするんですか！
廊下に行ってくださいっ！
translation:
Why are you trying to change here?
Please go to the hallway!

japanese:
……あ。
そうだな、すまん……。
translation:
...Ah.
That's right, sorry...

japanese:
はああ……。
不意打ちすぎて心臓が止まるかと思ったわ。
translation:
*sigh*
I thought my heart was going to stop
from being startled like that.

japanese:
すみません……。
うちだと、部屋が１つしかないから……。
translation:
I'm sorry...
We only have one room at home, so...

japanese: なんていうか、大変ですね……。
translation: That's kind of tough, isn't it...

japanese: よし、着替えたぞ。
translation: Alright, I've changed.

japanese:
あっ！　せっかくですので、
ばっちりモデルなポーズを決めて
入ってきてくださいね。
translation:
Since this is the perfect chance, 
please come in and strike a pose like a model would, okay?

japanese: そこまでやれと！？
translation: You want me to go that far?!

japanese: 指導しよっか？
translation: Shall I give you some pointers?

japanese:
いや、そこまでやると
グダグダになるからいいわよ。
translation:
No, it'll just get tedious
if we go that far.

japanese: フータロー、そのまま入ってきて。
translation: Futaro, come in just as you are.

japanese:
へいへい。
それじゃ、入るぞ。
translation:
Yeah, yeah.
I'm coming in.

japanese: おおーっ！
translation: Ooohh!

japanese: （くっ、なんだその反応は……）
translation: (Urk what's with that reaction?)

japanese: お兄ちゃん、カッコいい！
translation: Big bro, you look cool!

japanese: ふふん、でしょ？
translation: Hehe, I know, right?

japanese:
えー、それでは一花さん！
なぜこのコーディネートにしたか、
コメントをお願いします！
translation:
Okay, then, Ichika-san!
Could you please comment
on why you chose this outfit?

japanese:
そうですねー。
まず、フータロー君にはトラッドスタイルが
似合いそうだなって思ったからです。
translation:
Well, let's seeee.
First of all, I thought a traditional style
would suit Futaro-kun.

japanese:
私も同意見。
けど思った以上に似合うわ。
translation:
I agree.
But it looks even better on him than I thought.

japanese:
まるで別人のようです。
服が違うだけで、こうも変わるのですね。
translation:
He looks like a completely different person.
It's amazing how much a change of clothes can make.

japanese: さすが一花、センスがいい。
translation: As expected of Ichika, she has great sense.

japanese:
おおっと！
さっそく審査員からは高評価の嵐！
トップバッターに相応しい出だしです！
translation:
Wowee!
The judges are already giving high praise!
A great start for the first contestant!

japanese: あ、そのまま司会役をやるのな、お前。
translation: Oh, so you're going to be the host, huh?

japanese: これはもう優勝は決まりかな～？
translation: I wonder if it's already over?

japanese: あら、ちょっと気が早いんじゃない？
translation: Oh, come on, isn't that a bit premature?

japanese:
確かに、一花のコーデは
フー君によく似合ってると思うけど……
言ってみれば無難すぎるのよね。
translation:
Indeed, while I do think
Ichika's outfit suits Fu-kun...
To put it bluntly, it's a bit too safe.

japanese:
へえ？
そこまで言うなら、二乃のコーディネートを
見せてもらおうかな？
translation:
Well, then?
If you're going to say that much,
why don't we have you show us your outfit, Nino?

japanese:
ええ、もちろん。
それじゃフー君、この服でお願い。
translation:
Yes, of course.
Alright, Fu-kun, put this on.

japanese: わかった。
translation: Got it.

japanese:
おおー？
こうきたかぁ。
translation:
Ohh?
This is what you went with, huh.

japanese: なんか雑誌に載ってる人みたい。
translation: He looks like someone from a magazine.

japanese: うん、ストリートスナップっぽい。
translation: Yes, it has a 'street' feel to it.

japanese: 一気にカジュアルな感じになりましたね。
translation: Things've suddenly become very casual.

japanese:
それでは二乃さん！
このコーディネートについてコメントを！
translation:
Now, Nino-san!
Could you please comment on this outfit?

japanese:
コンセプトは、一緒に街を歩くなら
こんな服を着ていてほしい、かしらね。

あと、裏テーマはギャップね。
普段のフー君とのギャップ！
translation:
The underlying theme is the gap.
The gap between Fu-kun's usual style and this one!

japanese:
なるほどねー。
どう？　フータロー君としては。
translation:
I seeee.
So, how do you feel about it, Futaro-kun?

japanese:
あー、その、服自体は悪くないんだが……
少し落ち着かないな。
translation:
Ah, well, the outfit itself isn't bad, but...
it's a bit too flashy for me.

japanese: うん、ちょっとチャラい感じがする。
translation: Yeah, he kind of looks like a playboy.

japanese:
言ったわね、三玖。
それなら、あんたのコーデを
見せてもらおうじゃない。
translation:
You really said that, huh, Miku.
In that case,
why don't you show us the outfit you put together?

japanese:
服はもう決まってる。
フータロー、これでお願い。
translation:
I've already picked out the clothes.
Futaro, please wear this.

japanese:
お前ら、ポンポン服を渡しやがって。
着替えるの、割と面倒なんだぞ。
translation:
You guys keep giving me these weird clothes to wear.
Changing into them is kind of a hassle, you know?

japanese:
大丈夫。
私が選んだのは着替えやすいやつだから。
translation:
Don't worry.
I picked something easy to change into.

japanese: そういう問題じゃない……。
translation: That's not the problem...

japanese:
フータロー、早く。
着て、見せてほしい。
translation:
Come on, Futaro.
Hurry and change. I want you to show everyone.

japanese: ……わかった、大人しく着替えればいいんだろ。
translation: ...Okay, I guess I'll just behave myself and change.

japanese: こ、これは……。
translation: Wh-what's this...?

japanese:
甚平って……。
三玖の趣味を考えれば
ありえるコーデではあるけど……。
translation:
A 'jinbei'...
Miku, Considering your sensibilities,
I can see where this is coming from, but...

japanese:
では三玖さん？
この服を選んだ理由を聞かせてもらいましょー！
translation:
Now, how about you, Miku-san?
Please, tell us why you chose this outfit!

japanese: やっぱり、フータローには和服が似合うから。
translation:
I thought that a Japanese-style outfit
would suit Futaro.

japanese:
即答だったか。
まあ、似合うとは思うけどね。
らいはちゃんはどう？
translation:
That was a quick response.
Well, I do think it suits him, though.
Raiha-chan, what do you think?

japanese: お祭りに来てる人みたいだねー。
translation: He looks like he's at a summer festival.

japanese:
一応、普通に街を歩くときの服のつもりで
選んだんだけど。
translation:
Actually, I meant for this to be worn as a normal outfit to
walk around town.

japanese: いや、これで街を歩くのは勇気がいるぞ？
translation:
Nah, it would take a lot of courage to walk 
around town in this kinda outfit, ya know?

japanese:
時期にもよるわね。
今なら、まあ、あり？
translation:
That depends on the time of year I suppose.
It could be okay, for summer, right?

japanese: ……なんか、微妙な反応が多い。
translation: ...Hmm, there seems to be a mixed reaction.

japanese:
あはは……。
じゃあ、次は私だね。
上杉さん、これでお願いします。
translation:
Ahaha...
Anyway, it's my turn next.
Uesugi-san, please put this on.

japanese:
うっ！？
こ、これを着るのか？
translation:
Oof!!
Y-you want me to wear this?

japanese:
えええ？
なんでそんなに嫌そうなんですか？
translation:
Huhhh?
Why do you look so unhappy?

japanese: さあ、これが私の選んだ服です！
translation: Well, this is the outfit I chose!

japanese:
どうですか上杉さん？
夏ですし、やっぱり涼しくと思いまして。
translation:
What do you think, Uesugi-san?
Since it's summer, I thought it should cool you down.

japanese: ぷっ……くくく……っ！
translation: Ppfft...hehehe...heh!

japanese:
んんっ……！
ふっ、ふふふ……！
translation:
Mmmm...!
Ffwhahaha...!

japanese: ……くふっ！
translation: ...Hehe!

japanese:
まあ……こういうネタ枠も
１つはないとダメだし、ね？
translation:
Well...
we need at least one person to make a joke, right?

japanese:
だ、だからって……っ！
この組み合わせは……あまりにも似合わないっ……。
ぷくく……。
translation:
B-but even so...!
This combination...doesn't exactly suit Fu-kun at all...
Ppfft-hheheh...

japanese:
あれ！？　なんか反応がおかしいよ？
なんでみんな笑うの我慢してるの？
translation:
Huh?! Something's off about the reaction.
Why is everyone holding back laughter?

japanese:
いえ……っ！
そんな、ことは……ふふふっ！
translation:
No...!
That's not...hahahah!

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、細い。
筋肉足りてない。
translation:
Big bro, you're too skinny.
You need some more muscles.

japanese:
あー、言っちゃったよ。
さすが身内、容赦ないねぇ。
translation:
Ahh, she said it.
As expected from family. No mercy, huh?

japanese: ……ああ、自分でも思ってる。
translation: ...Oh, I already know that.

japanese: 評価そっちなんですか！？
translation: Oh, are we evaluating physique, now?!

japanese:
四葉。
お前、ちゃんと考えて選んだか？
translation:
Yotsuba.
Did you really think it through
before choosing this outfit?

japanese:
考えましたよ？
夏だから涼しくがコンセプトです。
translation:
I did...
The concept was to cool you down for summer, Uesugi-san.

japanese:
うーん……。
これは、四葉のチョイスが悪かったって
いうよりは……。
translation:
Hmm...
It's not that Yotsuba
made a bad choice, but...

japanese: そうね……フー君には悪いけど……。
translation: That's right... It's mean to you, Fu-kun...

japanese: もう少し、体を鍛えたほうがいい。
translation: You should train your body a little more.

japanese: 服の評価をしてよぉ～！
translation: Judge the CLOTHES!

japanese:
ふふっ……！
あははははっ！
translation:
Heheh...!
AHAHAHAHA!

japanese:
おい五月！
笑ってないで、さっさとお前が選んだ服を寄越せ！
translation:
Hey, Itsuki!
Instead of laughing, just show us the outfit you picked!

japanese: ど、どうぞ……こちらです……。
translation: H-here... It's this...

japanese: くっ……！
translation: Urk...!

japanese: さあ、最後は五月の服だね！
translation: Alright, last up is Itsuki's outfit!

japanese: ……普通ねぇ。
translation: ...How normal.

japanese:
シンプルに、シャツとズボンの組み合わせか。
うん、確かに普通。
translation:
Just a simple shirt and pants combo.
Yeah, it's definitely normal.

japanese:
私は、結構好きかも。
一緒に歩くなら、これはあり。
translation:
I actually quite like it.
If we were walking together, this would work.

japanese: それでは五月さん、コメントをどうぞ。
translation: Alright then, Itsuki-san. A comment, please?

japanese:
私も、理由は一花と変わりません。
上杉君にはこれが似合うと思ったんです。
translation:
My reason is the same as Ichika's.
I thought this outfit would suit Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
あと、以前、男らしい服は
好みではないと聞きましたので。
translation:
Also, I heard from before
that he doesn't like masculine clothes.

japanese:
（ああ、林間学校のために服を買いに行ったときか。
　あれは凄まじかったな）
translation:
(Ah, was that when we went to buy clothes
 for the school camping trip, huh.
 That was intense.)

japanese: （それに比べれば、ずいぶんと普通だ）
translation: (Compared to that, this is quite normal.)

japanese: らいはちゃんはどうですか？
translation: What do you think, Raiha-chan?

japanese:
いつものお兄ちゃんって感じかな？
でも、すごく似合ってると思う！
translation:
I think it's just like the usual style for big bro.
But, I think it looks really good on him!

japanese:
（俺も、この服は落ち着くな。
　らいはの言う通り、普段着てるやつに
　近いからだろうか）
translation:
(I also feel calm in this outfit.
 Maybe it's because it's similar
 to what I usually wear.)

japanese:
……なあ、これで最後だよな？
着替えて来てもいいか？
translation:
...Okay, this is the last one, right?
Can I change back, now?

japanese:
では最後に、特別ゲストとして
らいはちゃんのコーデを……。
translation:
Now, as a special guest,
let's see Raiha-chan's outfit...

japanese: 着替えてくる。
translation: I'm gonna go change.

japanese:
あっ！？　上杉さん！？
待ってくださいよー！
translation:
Ah! Uesugi-san?!
Please wait!

japanese: ああ、行っちゃった。
translation: Oh, he left.

japanese:
まあ、充分あそべ……
じゃなくて、コーディネート勝負はできたし。
translation:
Well, we were able to pla...
I mean,
we had a fulfilling clothing coordination battle.

japanese: あんた今、遊べたって言おうとしたわね？
translation: You were about to say 'able to play,' weren't you?

japanese: なんのことかなぁ？
translation: What are you talking about?

japanese:
それよりも、フータロー君が戻ってきたら、
お待ちかねの結果発表の時間だよ？
translation:
More importantly, once Futaro-kun returns, 
it's time for the long-awaited announcement 
of the results, right?

japanese: うん、楽しみ。
translation: Yes, I'm excited.

japanese: ま、結果は見えてるわね。
translation: Well, the results are pretty clear, right?

japanese: 二乃、自信満々だ。
translation: Nino is confident she'll win.

japanese:
あの、結果を楽しみにするのはよいのですが、
この服の山を片付けることも忘れないでくださいね？
translation:
Um, it's fine to look forward to the results,
but please don't forget we have to clean up 
this pile of clothes, okay?

japanese:
うっ……。
思い出させないでよ……。
translation:
Ooh...
Don't remind me...
